meanings.definition: A small table or cabinet typically placed beside a bed.
meanings.sent1: My new nightstands have a drawer for storing books and glasses.
meanings.sent2: I keep my alarm clock on the nightstands next to my bed.
meanings.sent3: When I accidentally bumped into the nightstands, my water spilled everywhere!
meanings.sent4: The nightstands stood like loyal guardians next to the bed, holding all my essentials.
meanings.sent5: The nightstands with their elegant design added a touch of sophistication to the bedroom.

meanings.definition: To place or set a nightstand beside a bed.
meanings.sent1: I will nightstands the new furniture in the guest room tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She nightstands the lamp on the bedside table before going to sleep.
meanings.sent3: He nightstands the vase of flowers so carefully, it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The interior designer decided to nightstands the nightstands at an angle for a modern look.
meanings.sent5: They always nightstands the nightstands last when rearranging the bedroom layout.
